alert.note: Alert for Hardin (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 1:56PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Tishomingo and southeastern Hardin Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 156 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pickwick Landing State Park, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... J P Coleman State Park, Walnut Grove, Lowryville, Center Star, Pollards Mill and Winn Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
